Patch Set 1: I would prefer that you didn't merge this

Two suggestions:
1. It would be nice if you can just port the policy stuff from oslo given the background of this bug.
2. How about split this patch into two? One for porting, the other is for the changing related to the policy transformation?
Thanks.

Patch Set 6: I would prefer that you didn't merge this

Hi Julia,

Would you please provide a bit of a justification in the commit message for why you are updating the code. Are there some bug fixes you are aiming for us to pick up? Or is there some new functionality you want to use in a later patch?

I'm just wondering, because of the review guidelines for oslo syncing changes: https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/ReviewChecklist#Oslo_Syncing_Checklist

Thanks!
